job title: Sr. Software Engineer (Natural User Interaction Interface)
job description:
Baidu USA, headquartered in Silicon Valley, is looking for talented engineer for DuerOS (https://dueros.baidu.com/).

DuerOS is Baidu's conversational AI platform which empowers every device to be able to interact with users with natural languages. The device empowered by DuerOS can hear, understand and fulfill user needs. By working with over 130 partners, DuerOS is the most vibrant AI ecosystem in China. DuerOS smart devices are now everywhere, including TV, mobile phone, cars, speakers, etc. Through DuerOS empowered devices, users can access 10 categories and over 100 native skills including video & audio, smart home, information, entertainment and services, etc. DuerOS has also launched DuerOS Intelligent Devices Platform and DuerOS Bots Platform which have attracted over 10,000 developers to its ecosystem.

Here's what you will do:
  • Prototyping, designing and building innovative interaction interface for conversational assistant products;
  • Processing various sensor inputs (RGB camera, Infrared sensors, radar, etc) and applying models on embedded systems such as Android, Linux ARM;
  • Designing and developing application framework to enable applications built on top of new interaction interfaces;
  • Designing, developing, evaluating and improving deep learning / machine learning models for perception and recognition, such as user presence and profile, gesture recognition, etc;
Here's what we'd like to see in you:
  • Strong problem solving and programming skills;
  • Familiar with one of prevalent programming languages: Java, C++, Python;
  • Prior experience on Android and embedded system is strongly preferred;
  • Prior experience on performance profiling and tuning on embedded systems is strongly preferred;
  • Prior experience on deep learning and machine learning, especially on computer vision area, is strongly preferred;
  • Advanced degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, EE, Maths or related discipline.
Culture Fit:
  • Mission alignment: If you want to be part of a team to accomplish this great mission, we will provide you the best possible platform to do that.
  • Self­-directed: We work best with people that are driven, motivated, and aspire to greatness. Are you the sort of person that, if you had time on your hands, will independently find interesting and useful things to do?
  • Hungry to learn: We are eager to see you learn new skills and grow. But learning is hard work and this is something we hope you want to do.
  • Team orientation: We work in small, fast­-moving teams. We don't believe in lone wolves. We watch out for each other and go after big goals together as a team
